story: When Lisa left Jacob he was deep asleep  on the beach. A few minutes later a  wave woke him. Seeing Lisa was gone  Jacob decided to go swimming.
question:
Lisa now believes that Jacob is sleeping.

True or False

story: At the time a portrait was drawn of a  young man, he had short brown hair and  no facial hair. Now the man's hair is  long and gray and so is his beard.
question:
Today the length of the man's hair 
is long.

True or False
